column4: I just setup a ubuntu file server for a small office and put it on the network. Now I want to be able to log in from home, but I'm lost on where to go from here. Any suggestions?
yes I have putty open in another window now
I can access from within the lan, but how to I access it from outside the lan?
you need to go into ur router and port foward ur ip with port number 22 (if that is ur ssh port)
